info.name: team-notify
info.description: TeamNotify sends build notifications from TeamCity to Slack, Microsoft Teams, and Discord via webhooks. Configure multiple webhooks per Project or Build Configuration with rich triggers (Build Started, Success/Failure, First Failure, Fixed, Stalled, longer than a duration, longer than average). URLs are validated per platform. Adds a TeamNotify tab to Project and Build Configuration pages and an Administration > TeamNotify overview.
